product_name: Sierra Designs Microlight Pants - Women's Petite - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's petite Microlight Pants from Sierra Designs provide wind protection and water resistance on or off the trail-plus they pack up small in their own stuff sack. Polyester taffeta fabric with a durable water repellent finish offers ample water- and wind-resistance at a great value. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes the fit; leg hems are open. Seams are not sealed, but the pants offer water resistance in light rain for a short period of time. 29 in. inseam on the Sierra Designs Microlight Petite pants are 2 in. shorter than regular-length women's Microlight pants. Closeout.
